frequency.description: How often to run the sync (default: every 5 minutes)

lookbackPeriod.description: How far back to look for incidents in each sync run

timeout.description: Maximum time allowed for each sync operation

severity.description: Incident severities to sync. Remove values to exclude certain severities.

status.description: Incident statuses to sync. Typically excludes closed incidents.

title.description: Exclude incidents with titles matching these patterns (case-insensitive)

deduplication.description: Prevent duplicate incidents from being created

enrichment.description: Add metadata to synced incidents for tracking

errorHandling.description: Configure retry and error handling behavior

performance.description: Control concurrency to avoid API throttling. Use 1 for sequential processing.

notifications.description: Configure notifications for sync failures (implement separately)
